AOM.PluginSettings_Setting_CreateNewVisitWhe: Create new visit when campaign changes
Unless you have major reasons (like an external logic that determines the beginning of a new visit), this should always be activated.
AOM.Report_MarketingPerformance_Description:
Online marketing performance KPI are based on "last cookie wins".
We recommend to import Piwik's data into your data warehouse and evaluate alternative approaches to conversion attribution.
AOM.Settings_Introduction:
You must activate and deactivate advertising platforms in the plugin's settings first. After that, you can manage the accounts of activated advertising platforms here.

Make sure, that the timezone of each advertising platform account matches the timezone of the website that you import your data for.
AOM.Settings_ConfirmAccountRemove: Are you sure you want to delete this account?
AOM.Settings_IndividualCampaigns_Introductio:
For some campaigns, such as email marketing partnerships or CPA deals, there might not be an advertising platform with an API, where you can fetch the additional data (like campaign names and cost) from. Therefore Piwik AOM allows you to provide this data and Piwik AOM distributes the costs to the visits that resulted from the campaign (even if there were no visits the costs are still being considered).

Read the full documentation about individual campaigns here.
AOM.Settings_IndividualCampaigns_ConfirmCamp: Are you sure you want to delete this campaign?
AOM.VisitorProfile_TotalCost: Total acquisition cost for %1$s visits of %2$s.
